name: Whipped Shea Butter
description:
Shea butter is valued for its vitamin properties because it is rich in Vitamins A, E and F which helps to provide moisture to dry and/or damaged hair and skin. My shea butter is unrefined grade A and whipped with nourishing sweet almond (can be replaced if you have a nut allergy), coconut oil, extra virgin olive oil, and an essential oil for a creamy spreadable texture. It is made to easily penetrate skin and hair, providing extra moisture without clogging pores. This product is 100% natural and organic.

You will only need a SMALL amount so this product will last you a while. A little goes a long way!

*Product does contain nut based oil

No Preservatives 
No Silicones
No Alcohol
No Parabens 
No Petroleum 
No Mineral Oil
